mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, mid, email, is_approval, role, bid, name, address, created_at FROM ( SELECT m.mid, m.email, m.is_approval, m.role, b.bid, b.name, b.address, b.created_at FROM member m JOIN branch b ON m.mid = b.member_mid WHERE m.role = 'ROLE_BRANCH' AND m.is_approval = '승인 대기' ORDER BY b.created_at DESC ) WHERE rownum <= #{endRowNo} ) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE role = 'ROLE_BRANCH' AND is_approval = '승인 대기'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, mid, email, is_approval, role, bid, name, address, created_at FROM ( SELECT m.mid, m.email, m.is_approval, m.role, b.bid, b.name, b.address, b.created_at FROM member m JOIN branch b ON m.mid = b.member_mid WHERE m.role = 'ROLE_BRANCH' AND m.is_approval IN ('승인', '가입 거절') ORDER BY b.created_at DESC ) WHERE rownum <= #{endRowNo} ) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE role = 'ROLE_BRANCH' AND is_approval IN ('승인', '가입 거절')
